snippet: Many of the Republican attacks against President Obama have racist undertones.
abstract: Many of the Republican attacks against President Obama have racist undertones.
lead_paragraph: DES MOINES - Talking about race in American politics is uncomfortable and awkward. But it has to be said: There has been a racist undertone to many of the Republican attacks leveled against President Obama for the last three years, and in this dawning presidential campaign.

headline.main: Nobody Likes to Talk About It, but It's There
